long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PassKeeper Viewer is a secure Chrome extension that allows you to easily access and view your encrypted .chrisanthos password files. View your stored credentials with a simple, user-friendly interface. Features include:

• Decryption of .chrisanthos files using your master password
• Secure storage of decrypted data for quick access
• Copy username and password with a single click
• Show/hide password functionality for added security
• Manual lock option for immediate data protection

Keep your passwords at your fingertips while maintaining top-level security with PassKeeper Viewer.

PassKeeper Viewer extension is part of Windows PassKeeper Editor and PassKeeper Viewer.
To create and modify .chrisanthos file, PassKeeper Editor is nessesary.
